metadata.title: CVE-2021-42739 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The firewire subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.14.13 has a bufferoverflow related to drivers/media/firewire/firedtv-avc.c anddrivers/media/firewire/firedtv-ci.c, because avc_ca_pmt mishandles boundschecking.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
